Summary: Orb seen zipping around while I was driving towards Annapolis.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving towards Annapolis, MD on US Route 50 East at 10:30 am on April 14th it was sun shining, clear and cold outside. I looked up to my 1:00 position and saw something flash. So I bent down a little to get a better look and I saw an orb just hovering in the sky. As I was watching, it immediately zipped from the 1:00 position to the 4:00 position in a split second and stopped dead in it's tracks. It happened extremely fast and moved roughly 500 yards south in a split second. It was now in my 3:00-4:00 position. I happened to have my digital camera with me and using fast thinking I grabbed it and snapped a quick photo. The Orb made no noise, nothing was seen around it and it was just hovering in the sky. It isn't a weather balloon because balloons don't move like that, nor was it a plane or bird or blimp. I pulled off at an exit about 3 to 5 miles outside of Annapolis near a town called Crownsville, MD and got out. I didn't see the object any longer. I got home and checked my camera and sure enough, there it was. My windshield is dirty, so I put a red arrow pointing out the object. Otherwise, the picture has not been edited or enhanced in any way. Keep looking up !
